704869f-a.title: Brooklyn: Herkimer Street - Kingston Avenue
704869f-a.text:
380-412 Herkimer Street, south side, betwcen Kingston to Albany Aves.
TThe view shows the Brooklyn Nursery and Infants Hospital of the Salvation
Army.
June 2, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.

704871f-a.title: Brooklyn: Herkimer Street - Kingston Avenue

422-426 Herkimer Street, south side, between Kingston and Albany
Aves.
June 2, 1929.

704868f-a.title: Brooklyn: Herkimer Street - Kingston Avenue
704868f-a.text:
Herkimer Street, west from Kingston Avenue. On the south side
of the street, but actually not seen here, is the Brooklyn Orphan
Asylum grounds.
September 13. 1940
P. L. Sperr
